channel.title: INsmh

item.title: Mystery footprints appear at coffee shop ‘haunted by soldier from 1800s’
item.description: 'Within the first week of the shop, I kept hearing the sound of rustling noises in the office.'

item.title: Anaheim Halloween horror as car ploughs into multiple people in sickening scenes
item.description: Video footage posted by attendees shows smoke billowing from the street where the crowd was gathered before people started "smashing the drivers car"

item.title: Expert shares 'red flag' signs your hormones are out of balance
item.description: Naturopath Jaime discussed the "red flags" she sees in patients with hormone imbalances, including bloating, painful periods and headaches

item.title: Hundreds turn out for Halloween parade that wasn’t real
item.description: The confusion seems to have originated from an AI-generated website.

item.title: Greggs loving runner takes on 9,600 calorie sausage roll eating marathon

item.title: Dad woke up thinking it was 1980 after he was injured in a car crash
item.description: After he was hit by a car and left in a coma in 2019, Luciano D'Adamo woke up believing the year was 1980
